panels.title: Node IP
panels.description: Node IP Address ${ip}.  Unique identifier for node

panels.title: Cluster
panels.description: cls = ${cls}. Used as an unique cluster identifier and resource namespace.

panels.title: Instance
panels.description: ins = ${ins}, used as unique instance identifier. Formed as {{ cls }}-{{ seq }}.

panels.title: PCI-E SSD
panels.description: Size of available pci-e nvme disk space

panels.title: Bond
panels.description: Is any network interface in bond mode?

panels.title: Machine
panels.description: Is this machine a virtual machine or physical (Simply Judge by cpu count)
Alerting event graph. Each stripe represent an alerting Event. Gray transparent stipe are pending alerts.

panels.title: CPU Time by State (per Second)
panels.description: Sum of all state will approximately to the number of cpu core

panels.title: Schedule Waiting Time
panels.description: How long processes had to be wait to be scheduled on that CPU.

panels.title: Read/Write IOPS
panels.description: ▲ for read IOPS, ▼ for write IOPS

panels.title: Read/Write Bandwidth
panels.description: ▲ for read bandwidth, ▼ for write bandwidth

panels.title: Reads/Writes Merged Ratio
panels.description:
Merged ratio of read / write requests
▲ for read ▼ for write

panels.title: Read/Write Request Size (areq-sz)
panels.description: ▲ for read, ▼ for write, Showing I/O pattern

panels.title: Read/Write Await Time
panels.description: ▲ for read rt, ▼ for write rt

panels.title: Average Service Time (svctm)
panels.description: ▲ for read rt, ▼ for write rt

panels.title: Instant Queue Size
panels.description: Number of items which were in the queue at the sampling time point

panels.title: Average Queue Size
panels.description: average number of operations waiting to be serviced.

panels.title: Avail Space 1D Predict
panels.description: Prediction of avail filesystem space a day later!
